text: Minnesota’s chief judge, a veteran in conservative legal circles, takes on ICE - Politico

text: The DHS crisis is squeezing Susan Collins - Politico

text: Bari Weiss to CBS News staff: Without a shift in strategy, “we are toast.” - The Washington Post

text: After Further Review: How the Patriots Defense Won the AFC Title Game, Maye Breakdown, and Quick-Hit Film Notes From Sunday's Win in Denver - New England Patriots
fullText: The Patriots are headed back to the Super Bowl thanks to a 10-7 win over the Broncos on Sunday, but they'll need more from the offense in Santa Clara.

text: Consumer Price Index climbs 3.6% YoY in December, as expected - FXStreet
fullText: Australia’s Consumer Price Index (CPI) climbed by 3.6% year-over-year (YoY) in December, following a 3.5% increase (revised from 3.4%) reported in the previous reading, the latest data published by the Australian Bureau of Statistics (ABS) showed on Wednesday.

text: S.F. private high school has three cases of active tuberculosis - sfchronicle.com
fullText: San Francisco public health officials have identified three active TB cases at the private high school since November.

text: Diplomats Worry Xi’s Purge Will Curb Critical Contact With China - Bloomberg.com
fullText: Xi Jinping’s purge of top Chinese generals has cost Western governments a key contact and deepened fears that the People’s Liberation Army is becoming even more walled-off from contact.

text: NTSB blames 'deep' systemic failures for deadly midair collision near Washington D.C. - NPR
fullText: After a yearlong investigation, the National Transportation Safety Board did not find a single cause for the deadly collision near Washington, D.C., but blamed the crash on multiple systemic failures.

text: Asia markets open mostly higher after S&P 500 hits record, South Korea pushes fresh highs - CNBC
fullText: Markets across Asia extended gains Wednesday after a record close on Wall Street, with Australia’s inflation release in focus.

text: Microsoft promises behind the scenes platform changes on Windows 11 in 2026 - Windows Central

text: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ HUNTR/X conquer the charts and claim their destiny - NPR
fullText: The fictional band HUNTR/X from the hit Netflix film KPop Demon Hunters went from a group no one had ever heard of to one of the biggest pop acts of 2025. Now they have five Grammy nominations.

text: Trump Claims Ilhan Omar Is Worth $44M. Here’s Why That’s Highly Unlikely. - Forbes
fullText: Her 2024 disclosure reported total business values rather than individual stakes, creating wide net-worth ranges that opponents have taken as literal estimates of her personal wealth.

text: The State-Led Crackdown on Grok and xAI Has Begun - WIRED
